title: Apparently Left at Champ Select When I didn't
body:
So just queued for a game, get into champ select where you declare your champion and got booted out to the main screen.

Apparently I left during champ select and copped the penalty for it plus -LP.

Anyone else had this? What happens if it's a promo game?

replies.body: You really are dense aren't you? Honestly. You come into my thread, make a pathetic stupid comment, make yourself look ridiculous then try and put it back onto me? Go grab a maxipad out your purse and relax a little. Seriously you are pretty pathetic.

> [{quoted}](name=JesusForgotHisGA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yTAdmpPO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-02-09T10:24:28.632+0000)
>
> You really are dense aren't you? Honestly. You come into my thread, make a pathetic stupid comment, make yourself look ridiculous then try and put it back onto me? Go grab a maxipad out your purse and relax a little. Seriously you are pretty pathetic.

your name isn't unique when it's just a variation on another name tbh, you're just another name in the sea of j"esus-verb-GA".
dude no he is mega special and unique and funny and cool and quirky dont diss my man

your name is dumb. jesus didn't forget his GA. he died, then came back because of his GA, then died again before it came off cooldown.

did your internet drop out or something? and if it was a promo game, it would've counted as a loss.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yTAdmpPO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-09T02:36:11.868+0000)
>
> your name is dumb. jesus didn't forget his GA. he died, then came back because of his GA, then died again before it came off cooldown.
> 
> did your internet drop out or something? and if it was a promo game, it would've counted as a loss.

Maybe he forgot his GA was on cool down? It's a summoner name that's required to be unique. You think JesusHadAGA wasn't taken or the many other variants? Get a grip champ.

And no, my internet didn't drop out or anything similar. Just straight up got booted from champ select and received the penalty for it.

> [{quoted}](name=cute gamer girl,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yTAdmpPO,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-09T05:13:26.186+0000)
>
> unique name
> 
> kek

unique
juːˈniːk/Submit
adjective
1.
**being the only one of its kind**; unlike anything else.
"the situation was unique in British politics"
synonyms:	distinctive, individual, special, especial, idiosyncratic, quirky, eccentric, isolated; More

http://imgur.com/a/XFbRR

stupid
ˈstjuːpɪd/
adjective
adjective: stupid; comparative adjective: stupider; superlative adjective: stupidest

    1.
    having or showing a great lack of intelligence or common sense.
    "I was stupid enough to think she was perfect"
Hahah as sad as it may sound your 100% right. Don't even get me started on promo games wholy shit!
what happens if its a promo game? the game has now saved you from being trolled
